verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and to Aaron לֵאמֹ֥ר <WH559> saying אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

דַּבְּר֛וּ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying זֹ֤את <WH2063> These הַֽחַיָּה֙ <WH2416> [are] the beasts אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תֹּאכְל֔וּ <WH398> which ye shall eat מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> among all the beasts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> are on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> that [are] on the earth

כֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> Whatever מַפְרֶ֣סֶת <WH6536> Whatsoever parteth פַּרְסָ֗ה <WH6541> the hoof וְשֹׁסַ֤עַת <WH8156> making שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <WH8157> cleft פְּרָסֹ֔ת <WH6541> hoofs מַעֲלַ֥ת <WH5927> [and] cheweth גֵּרָ֖ה <WH1625> the cud בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> among the beasts אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> that shall ye eat

אַ֤ךְ <WH389> Nevertheless אֶת־ <WH853> זֶה֙ <WH2088> of these לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not תֹֽאכְל֔וּ <WH398> these shall ye not eat מִֽמַּעֲלֵי֙ <WH5927> of them that chew הַגֵּרָ֔ה <WH1625> the cud וּמִמַּפְרִיסֵ֖י <WH6536> or of them that divide הַפַּרְסָ֑ה <WH6541> the hoof אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַ֠גָּמָל <WH1581> [as] the camel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַעֲלֵ֨ה <WH5927> because he cheweth גֵרָ֜ה <WH1625> the cud ה֗וּא <WH1931> he וּפַרְסָה֙ <WH6541> not the hoof אֵינֶ֣נּוּ <WH369> does not מַפְרִ֔יס <WH6536> but divideth טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁפָ֗ן <WH8227> And the coney כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַעֲלֵ֤ה <WH5927> because he cheweth גֵרָה֙ <WH1625> the cud ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וּפַרְסָ֖ה <WH6541> not the hoof לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יַפְרִ֑יס <WH6536> but divideth טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאַרְנֶ֗בֶת <WH768> And the hare כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַעֲלַ֤ת <WH5927> because he cheweth גֵּרָה֙ <WH1625> the cud הִ֔וא <WH1931> he וּפַרְסָ֖ה <WH6541> not the hoof לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not הִפְרִ֑יסָה <WH6536> but divideth טְמֵאָ֥ה <WH2931> he [is] unclean הִ֖וא <WH1931> he לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַ֠חֲזִיר <WH2386> And the swine כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַפְרִ֨יס <WH6536> though he divide פַּרְסָ֜ה <WH6541> the hoof ה֗וּא <WH1931> thus וְשֹׁסַ֥ע <WH8156> making שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <WH8157> cleft פַּרְסָ֔ה <WH6541> hoof וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he גֵּרָ֣ה <WH1625> not the cud לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יִגָּ֑ר <WH1641> yet he cheweth טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> he [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָכֶֽם׃

מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <WH1320> Of their flesh לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> shall ye not eat וּבְנִבְלָתָ֖ם <WH5038> and their carcase לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִגָּ֑עוּ <WH5060> shall ye not touch טְמֵאִ֥ים <WH2931> they [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like לָכֶֽם׃

אֶת־ <WH853> זֶה֙ <WH2088> These תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <WH398> These shall ye eat מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> of all that [are] in the waters כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לוֹ֩ סְנַפִּ֨יר <WH5579> whatsoever hath fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֜שֶׂת <WH7193> and scales בַּמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> in the waters בַּיַּמִּ֛ים <WH3220> in the seas וּבַנְּחָלִ֖ים <WH5158> and in the rivers אֹתָ֥ם <WH853> תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> them shall ye eat

וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> that אֵֽין־ <WH369> have ל֜וֹ סְנַפִּ֣יר <WH5579> And all that have not fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֗שֶׂת <WH7193> and scales בַּיַּמִּים֙ <WH3220> in the seas וּבַנְּחָלִ֔ים <WH5158> and in the rivers מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> of all that move הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> in the waters וּמִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> thing הַחַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> and of any living אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> which [is] in the waters שֶׁ֥קֶץ <WH8263> they [shall be] an abomination הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like לָכֶֽם׃

וְשֶׁ֖קֶץ <WH8263> They shall be even an abomination יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become לָכֶ֑ם מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <WH1320> of their flesh לֹ֣א <WH3808> may not תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> unto you ye shall not eat וְאֶת־ <WH853> נִבְלָתָ֖ם <WH5038> but ye shall have their carcases תְּשַׁקֵּֽצוּ׃ <WH8262> in abomination

כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> does not אֵֽין־ <WH369> have ל֛וֹ סְנַפִּ֥יר <WH5579> Whatsoever hath no fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <WH7193> nor scales בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> in the waters שֶׁ֥קֶץ <WH8263> that [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> These תְּשַׁקְּצ֣וּ <WH8262> And these [are they which] ye shall have in abomination מִן־ <WH4480> among הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> the fowls לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יֵאָכְל֖וּ <WH398> they shall not be eaten שֶׁ֣קֶץ <WH8263> they [are] an abomination הֵ֑ם <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֶּ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH5404> the eagle וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפֶּ֔רֶס <WH6538> and the ossifrage וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> הָעָזְנִיָּֽה׃ <WH5822> and the ospray
וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַ֨דָּאָ֔ה <WH1676> And the vulture וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאַיָּ֖ה <WH344> and the kite לְמִינָֽהּ׃ <WH4327> after his kind
אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֹרֵ֖ב <WH6158> Every raven לְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH4327> after his kind

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> בַּ֣ת <WH1323> first הַֽיַּעֲנָ֔ה <WH3284> and the ostrich וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתַּחְמָ֖ס <WH8464> and the night hawk וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁ֑חַף <WH7828> and the cuckow וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנֵּ֖ץ <WH5322> and the hawk לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4327> after his kind
וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכּ֥וֹס <WH3563> And the little owl וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁלָ֖ךְ <WH7994> and the cormorant וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּנְשֽׁוּף׃ <WH3244> and the great owl
וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתִּנְשֶׁ֥מֶת <WH8580> And the swan וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַקָּאָ֖ת <WH6893> and the pelican וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָרָחָֽם׃ <WH7360> and the gier eagle

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הַחֲסִידָ֔ה <WH2624> And the stork הָאֲנָפָ֖ה <WH601> the heron לְמִינָ֑הּ <WH4327> after her kind וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַדּוּכִיפַ֖ת <WH1744> and the lapwing וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעֲטַלֵּֽף׃ <WH5847> and the bat

כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> All שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> that creep הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> All fowls הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> going עַל־ <WH5921> on אַרְבַּ֑ע <WH702> upon [all] four שֶׁ֥קֶץ <WH8263> [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָכֶֽם׃ ס

אַ֤ךְ <WH389> Yet אֶת־ <WH853> זֶה֙ <WH2088> these תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <WH398> Yet these may ye eat מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> creeping הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> of every flying הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> thing that goeth עַל־ <WH5921> on אַרְבַּ֑ע <WH702> upon [all] four אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which [לֹא כ] (לֹ֤ו <WH3808> not ק) כְרָעַ֙יִם֙ <WH3767> which have legs מִמַּ֣עַל <WH4605> above לְרַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> their feet לְנַתֵּ֥ר <WH5425> to leap בָּהֵ֖ן <WH2004> withal עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon the earth

אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> These מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> you תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> [Even] these of them ye may eat אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאַרְבֶּ֣ה <WH697> the locust לְמִינ֔וֹ <WH4327> after his kind וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַסָּלְעָ֖ם <WH5556> and the bald locust לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <WH4327> after his kind וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחַרְגֹּ֣ל <WH2728> and the beetle לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <WH4327> after his kind וְאֶת־ <WH853> הֶחָגָ֖ב <WH2284> and the grasshopper לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4327> after his kind

וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> creeping things הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> But all [other] flying אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ל֖וֹ אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> which have four רַגְלָ֑יִם <WH7272> feet שֶׁ֥קֶץ <WH8263> [shall be] an abomination ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָכֶֽם׃

וּלְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these תִּטַּמָּ֑אוּ <WH2930> And for these ye shall be unclean כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> whosoever toucheth בְּנִבְלָתָ֖ם <WH5038> the carcase יִטְמָ֥א <WH2930> of them shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְכָל־ <WH3605> and whoever הַנֹּשֵׂ֖א <WH5375> And whosoever beareth מִנִּבְלָתָ֑ם <WH5038> [ought] of the carcase יְכַבֵּ֥ס <WH3526> of them shall wash בְּגָדָ֖יו <WH899> his clothes וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

לְֽכָל־ <WH3605> all הַבְּהֵמָ֡ה <WH929> [The carcases] of every beast אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִוא֩ <WH1931> he מַפְרֶ֨סֶת <WH6536> which divideth פַּרְסָ֜ה <WH6541> the hoof וְשֶׁ֣סַע ׀ <WH8156> make אֵינֶ֣נָּה <WH369> else שֹׁסַ֗עַת <WH8157> cleft וְגֵרָה֙ <WH1625> the cud אֵינֶ֣נָּה <WH369> not מַעֲלָ֔ה <WH5927> nor cheweth טְמֵאִ֥ים <WH2931> [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like לָכֶ֑ם כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> unto you every one that toucheth בָּהֶ֖ם יִטְמָֽא׃ <WH2930> them shall be unclean

וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> whatever הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> goeth עַל־ <WH5921> on כַּפָּ֗יו <WH3709> upon his paws בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַֽחַיָּה֙ <WH2416> among all manner of beasts הַהֹלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> that go עַל־ <WH5921> on אַרְבַּ֔ע <WH702> on [all] four טְמֵאִ֥ים <WH2931> those [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like לָכֶ֑ם כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> unto you whoso toucheth בְּנִבְלָתָ֖ם <WH5038> their carcase יִטְמָ֥א <WH2930> shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְהַנֹּשֵׂא֙ <WH5375> And he that beareth אֶת־ <WH853> נִבְלָתָ֔ם <WH5038> the carcase יְכַבֵּ֥ס <WH3526> of them shall wash בְּגָדָ֖יו <WH899> his clothes וְטָמֵ֣א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> until the even טְמֵאִ֥ים <WH2931> they [are] unclean הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like לָכֶֽם׃ ס

וְזֶ֤ה <WH2088> now these לָכֶם֙ הַטָּמֵ֔א <WH2931> These also [shall be] unclean בַּשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <WH8318> unto you among the creeping things הַשֹּׁרֵ֣ץ <WH8317> that creep עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth הַחֹ֥לֶד <WH2467> the weasel וְהָעַכְבָּ֖ר <WH5909> and the mouse וְהַצָּ֥ב <WH6632> and the tortoise לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4327> after his kind
וְהָאֲנָקָ֥ה <WH604> And the ferret וְהַכֹּ֖חַ <WH3581> and the chameleon וְהַלְּטָאָ֑ה <WH3911> and the lizard וְהַחֹ֖מֶט <WH2546> and the snail וְהַתִּנְשָֽׁמֶת׃ <WH8580> and the mole

אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These הַטְּמֵאִ֥ים <WH2931> These [are] unclean לָכֶ֖ם בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַשָּׁ֑רֶץ <WH8318> to you among all that creep כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever הַנֹּגֵ֧עַ <WH5060> whosoever doth touch בָּהֶ֛ם בְּמֹתָ֖ם <WH4194> them when they be dead יִטְמָ֥א <WH2930> shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the even

וְכֹ֣ל <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִפֹּל־ <WH5307> doth fall עָלָיו֩ <WH5921> and מֵהֶ֨ם ׀ <WH1992> they בְּמֹתָ֜ם <WH4194> And upon whatsoever [any] of them when they are dead יִטְמָ֗א <WH2930> it shall be unclean מִכָּל־ <WH3605> any כְּלִי־ <WH3627> whether [it be] any vessel עֵץ֙ <WH6086> of wood א֣וֹ <WH176> or בֶ֤גֶד <WH899> or raiment אוֹ־ <WH176> or עוֹר֙ <WH5785> or skin א֣וֹ <WH176> or שָׂ֔ק <WH8242> or sack כָּל־ <WH3605> any כְּלִ֕י <WH3627> whatsoever vessel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of which יֵעָשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> is done מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> [it be] wherein [any] work בָּהֶ֑ם בַּמַּ֧יִם <WH4325> into water יוּבָ֛א <WH935> it must be put וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and it shall be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעֶ֖רֶב <WH6153> until the even וְטָהֵֽר׃ <WH2891> so it shall be cleansed

וְכָל־ <WH3605> any כְּלִי־ <WH3627> vessel חֶ֔רֶשׂ <WH2789> And every earthen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> may fall מֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like אֶל־ <WH413> about תּוֹכ֑וֹ <WH8432> hope כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> any אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which בְּתוֹכ֛וֹ <WH8432> hope יִטְמָ֖א <WH2930> whatsoever [is] in it shall be unclean וְאֹת֥וֹ <WH853> תִשְׁבֹּֽרוּ׃ <WH7665> and ye shall break

מִכָּל־ <WH3605> and any הָאֹ֜כֶל <WH400> Of all meat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יֵאָכֵ֗ל <WH398> which may be eaten אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יָב֥וֹא <WH935> cometh עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and מַ֖יִם <WH4325> [that] on which [such] water יִטְמָ֑א <WH2930> shall be unclean וְכָל־ <WH3605> every מַשְׁקֶה֙ <WH4945> and all drink אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִשָּׁתֶ֔ה <WH8354> that may be drunk בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every כְּלִ֖י <WH3627> in every [such] vessel יִטְמָֽא׃ <WH2930> shall be unclean
